channel.title: The fucking idiot fucked up again ;)
channel.description: a few days ago i started getting virtual memory dumps and it will go to a blue screen, this happens a lot even when there are no programs running/using the computer. This is really starting to piss me off. i have plenty of fucking space, and all that shit. the only explanation i could have for this is that ever since i started torrenting music like fucking crazy this started to happen slowly but the torrent and music are on an external hdd and i had that shit unplugged when all the VMD's happened. what the fuck is wrong with my computer? i do know it has to do with the .dll files... i think... idk im fuckin stupid

item.dc:creator: @thefalloffuckingtroy thefalloffuckingtroy.
item.description:
@thefalloffuckingtroy wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:4, topic:249498”][quote author=thefalloffuckingtroy. link=topic=328846.msg2571842#msg2571842 date=1228703773]

Yeah thanks for the comprehensive description and detailed information about what is wrong with your computer. We will now telepathically diagnose it, please hold.

thank you, thats the exact kind of answer i was looking for. as i said, i keep getting virtual memory dumps. thats the problem and now because my computer has been reduced to mear shit. firefox crashes everytime i open it and now i have to use this piece of shit called Internet explorer. D: its a nightmare
[/quote]
So run a fucking malware scan, or post a hijackthis log to some malware help site.
We can’t tell you how to fix your computer if you can’t tell us the cause of the problem.[/quote]

fuck, im pretty screwed. i can barely use my computer for 10 minutes before it shitting itself over

Read full topic
